/* JstatDao.listJstatGraphByDesign */ SELECT SERVER , S0 , S1 , E , O , P , JSTAT_TIME , YGC , YGCT , FGC , FGCT , TYGC , TYGCT , TFGC , TFGCT , TGCT FROM ( SELECT SERVER , S0 , S1 , E , O , P , JSTAT_TIME , YGC - LAG(YGC) OVER(ORDER BY JSTAT_ID) YGC , DECODE(YGC, LAG(YGC) OVER(ORDER BY JSTAT_ID), 0, (YGCT - LAG(YGCT) OVER(ORDER BY JSTAT_ID)) / (YGC - LAG(YGC) OVER(ORDER BY JSTAT_ID))) YGCT , FGC - LAG(FGC) OVER(ORDER BY JSTAT_ID) FGC , DECODE(FGC, LAG(FGC) OVER(ORDER BY JSTAT_ID), 0, (FGCT - LAG(FGCT) OVER(ORDER BY JSTAT_ID)) / (FGC - LAG(FGC) OVER(ORDER BY JSTAT_ID))) FGCT , FGC TFGC , FGCT TFGCT , YGC TYGC , YGCT TYGCT , GCT TGCT , JSTAT_ID FROM TB_JSTAT
WHERE JSTAT_TIME BETWEEN SYSTIMESTAMP - 1 AND SYSTIMESTAMP
WHERE JSTAT_TIME BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{fromTime}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24') AND TO_DATE(#{toTime}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24')
AND SERVER = #{server} ) WHERE YGC IS NOT NULL ORDER BY JSTAT_ID

/* JstatDao.selectJstatGraphByServer */ SELECT SERVER , S0 , S1 , E , O , P , JSTAT_TIME , YGC , YGCT , FGC , FGCT , TYGC , TYGCT , TFGC , TFGCT , TGCT, JSTAT_ID FROM ( SELECT SERVER , S0 , S1 , E , O , P , JSTAT_TIME , YGC - LAG(YGC) OVER(ORDER BY JSTAT_ID) YGC , DECODE(YGC, LAG(YGC) OVER(ORDER BY JSTAT_ID), 0, (YGCT - LAG(YGCT) OVER(ORDER BY JSTAT_ID)) / (YGC - LAG(YGC) OVER(ORDER BY JSTAT_ID))) YGCT , FGC - LAG(FGC) OVER(ORDER BY JSTAT_ID) FGC , DECODE(FGC, LAG(FGC) OVER(ORDER BY JSTAT_ID), 0, (FGCT - LAG(FGCT) OVER(ORDER BY JSTAT_ID)) / (FGC - LAG(FGC) OVER(ORDER BY JSTAT_ID))) FGCT , FGC TFGC , FGCT TFGCT , YGC TYGC , YGCT TYGCT , GCT TGCT , JSTAT_ID FROM TB_JSTAT WHERE SERVER = (SELECT SERVER FROM TB_SERVER WHERE SELECT_YN = 'Y' AND ROWNUM = 1) ORDER BY JSTAT_ID DESC ) WHERE YGC IS NOT NULL AND ROWNUM = 1
/* JstatDao.listServer */ SELECT SERVER , SELECT_YN FROM TB_SERVER
